pr_title: MAINTENANCE: Scheduled cron job for crowdin uploads on Crowdin using …

timeline.bodyText: Please update the name of this step since you are not using fastlane but curl directly.
timeline.author: m-herold
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,19 @@
+name: scheduled-upload-crowdin
+
+on:
+  schedule:
+    - cron:  '0 0 * * *'
+
+jobs:
+  build:
+    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+    steps:
+      - uses: actions/checkout@v2
+        with:
+          ref: develop
+      - name: Upload Localization to Crowdin by fastlane

timeline.message: MAINTENANCE: Scheduled cron job for crowdin uploads on Crowdin using crowdin apiv1
